{"id":861541409,"question_id":6,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 2 months","timestamp":1671350367,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"431 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/861541409/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Zigzag Conversion","memory":"9.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string convert(string s, int numRows) {\n        if(numRows == 1) return s;\n        char tmp[numRows][s.size()];\n        memset(tmp, 0, sizeof(tmp));\n        int loc, x, y, dx, dy;\n        int unit = 2 * numRows - 2;\n        loc = x = y = 0;\n        while(loc < s.size()){\n            cout << x << ' ' << y << ' ' << s[loc] << endl;\n            tmp[x][y] = s[loc];\n            if(loc % unit == 0) dx = 1, dy = 0;\n            else if(loc % unit == unit / 2) dx = -1, dy = 1;\n            x += dx, y += dy, loc++;\n        }\n        string ans = \"\";\n        for(int i = 0; i < numRows; i++){\n            for(int j = 0; j < ceil(double(s.size()) / 2.0); j++){\n                if(tmp[i][j]) ans += tmp[i][j]; \n                //cout << tmp[i][j] << \" \\n\"[j == ceil(s.size() / 2) - 1];\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"zigzag-conversion","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
